resource_value: 246.7Mt capable of producing a concentrate at >68% Fe
source_sentence: In Western Australia, Burley also owns a 70% interest in the Yerecoin Iron Ore Project, located approximately 120km northeast of Perth, and which has a JORC 2012 compliant Inferred and Indicated Mineral Resource of 246.7Mt capable of producing a concentrate at >68% Fe8.
resource_context: Yerecoin Iron Ore Project - JORC 2012 compliant Inferred and Indicated Mineral Resource (Burley's 70% interest)
